extends java.lang.Object

        Returns a list of activable powerup of type ON_DAMAGE for the selected player.
        Parameters:
        damagedPlayerName - the player to check for activable powerups.
        shootingPlayerName - the player shooting.
        Returns:
        a list of activable powerup of type ON_SHOOT.

      • getActivableOnTurnPowerups

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getActivableOnTurnPowerups(java.lang.String playerName)
        Returns a list of activable powerup of type ON_TURN for the selected player.
        Parameters:
        playerName - the player to check for activable powerups.
        Returns:
        a list of activable powerup of type ON_TURN.

      • doesPlayerHaveActivableOnTurnPowerups

        public boolean doesPlayerHaveActivableOnTurnPowerups(java.lang.String playerName)
        Returns true if the player has an activable powerup of type ON_TURN.
        Parameters:
        playerName - the player to check for.
        Returns:
        true if the player has an activable powerup of type ON_TURN.

      • isPowerupInExecution

        public boolean isPowerupInExecution(java.lang.String playerName)
        Returns true if there is a powerup in execution.
        Parameters:
        playerName - the player to check for.
        Returns:
        true if there is a powerup in execution.

      • initialPowerupActivation

        public QuestionContainer initialPowerupActivation(java.lang.String playerName,
                                                  int indexOfPowerup)
        Sets the specified powerup as the activated powerup of the player and then updates the reps.
        Parameters:
        playerName - name of the player.
        indexOfPowerup - index of the powerup to set as the activated powerup.
        Returns:
        the initial question container.

      • doPowerupStep

        public QuestionContainer doPowerupStep(java.lang.String playerName,
                                       int choice)
        Communicates the choice of the player, advance the powerup step and updates the reps.
        Parameters:
        playerName - name of the player that is activating the powerup.
        choice - index of the choice of the player.
        Returns:
        the next question container to show to the player.

        Handles the end of the powerup while resetting its attributes.
        Parameters:
        playerName - name of the player.
